data: Net loss attributable to shareholders of the parent company

Details: The loss attributable to shareholders of the parent company is calculated by subtracting the loss attributable to non-controlling interests from the total net loss of the company. The loss attributable to non-controlling interests is calculated by multiplying the net loss of the subsidiary by the percentage of non-controlling interests.
